name: OmniSet: Deposit Ethereum
title: Deposit assets on Ethereum to FastSet
description: Deposit a blockchain asset from Ethereum to FastSet.

vars.TOKEN: query:token|The contract address of the token to deposit.
vars.AMOUNT: query:amount|The amount of the token to deposit.
vars.RECEIVER: query:receiver|The blockchain wallet address of the receiver.

actions.label: Approve now
actions.abi: function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) public returns (bool)

actions.label: Deposit now
actions.abi: function deposit(address token, uint256 amount, string calldata receiver) public payable
